attributes.action: Stop mobile phone companys charging 40p for emojis they class it as pic message
attributes.background: We wasnt aware that emojis are being classed as picture messages until we received the bill and it was more than normal when we phoned up and queried this the emojis are bein classed as picture messages and charged at 40p per time

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of individual mobile phone companies.
